localXdsPath.description: Local XDS path. If not specified, the current configuration file will be used.

adminAddr.description: Admin UI address in the format "ip:port"

statsAddr.description: Stats/metrics server address in the format "ip:port"

readinessAddr.description: Readiness probe server address in the format "ip:port"

randomSampling.description:
Expression to determine the amount of *random sampling*.
Random sampling will initiate a new trace span if the incoming request does not have a trace already.
This should evaluate to either a float between 0.0-1.0 (0-100%) or true/false.
This defaults to 'false'.

clientSampling.description:
Expression to determine the amount of *client sampling*.
Client sampling determines whether to initiate a new trace span if the incoming request does have a trace already.
This should evaluate to either a float between 0.0-1.0 (0-100%) or true/false.
This defaults to 'true'.

requestHeaderModifier.description: Headers to be modified in the request.

responseHeaderModifier.description: Headers to be modified in the response.

requestRedirect.description: Directly respond to the request with a redirect.

urlRewrite.description: Modify the URL path or authority.

requestMirror.description: Mirror incoming requests to another destination.

directResponse.description: Directly respond to the request with a static response.

cors.description: Handle CORS preflight requests and append configured CORS headers to applicable requests.
